```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lavaan)
#install.packages("semTools")
library(semTools)
```


```{r}
items <- read_csv("Lab 10 Example Data.csv")

items <- items %>% 
  select(-X1)
```

#Models
```{r}

model <- "lv =~ NA*V1 + V2 + V3 + V4 + V5 + V6
lv ~~ 1*lv"

model.2f <-'f1 =~ NA*V1 + V2 + V5 + V6 + V8 + V9 + V12
  f2 =~ NA*V3 + V4 + V7 + V10 + V11
  f1 ~~ 1*f1
  f2 ~~ 1*f2'

```

#CFA1
```{r}
cfa_1 <- cfa(model = model, data = items)
summary(cfa_1, fit.measures=TRUE, standardized = TRUE)

```

```{r}
resid(cfa_1, type = "cor")
```
#CFA2
```{r}
cfa_2 <- cfa(model = model.2f, data = items)
summary(cfa_2, fit.measures=TRUE, standardized = TRUE)
```
```{r}
resid(cfa_2, type = "cor")
```
